message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on the development of a natural language to sign language translation system for a humanoid robot, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The use of neural networks and sequence-to-sequence models for the translation process suggests a strong emphasis on natural language processing (cs.CL) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The study also involves the acquisition of human skeleton data, which could be related to computer vision (cs.CV) research. Finally, the application of the system for human-robot interaction purposes suggests a potential connection to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
